scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack. The attacker aims to identify high-value customers based on their predicted churn probability, potentially for targeted marketing or fraudulent activities.
initial_goal: Develop a system to identify high-risk customers likely to churn within the next quarter.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A large bank uses a machine learning model to predict customer churn.  The model is trained on sensitive customer data including financial history, demographics, and transaction details.
